title: Hardland Release 12
description:
About This Game
PLEASE NOTE: This game is incomplete and under development! Our goal is to make Hardland one of the great action adventure RPGs. We would be thrilled to have you join us on this journey to find out what the land ruled by the dying Elder King is truly like. Hardland is currently in a pre-alpha stage which means there are many unfinished features and content missing from the game. We estimate to be able to release the finished game during 2015.

We want to make Hardland a world full of interesting characters, creatures, quests, and mysterious places. We will not dictate how you should play this game. We merely set the stage and let you make your own decisions.

Current Features

    The very incomplete experience
    Items that you can use in combat, including masks to disguise yourself or enchant creatures
    Nearly all objects are destructible - including the terrain!
    Visuals inspired by stop-motion film
    Extensive modding support!
    Temporary sound effects and music
    Physics powered by NVIDIA PhysX
